snippet: President Obama's campaign notched up their assault on Monday on Mitt Romney's record as governor of Massachusetts, putting $10 million behind a tough new commercial that claims Mr. Romney had "one of the worst economic records in the country."
abstract: President Obama's campaign notched up their assault on Monday on Mitt Romney's record as governor of Massachusetts, putting $10 million behind a tough new commercial that claims Mr. Romney had "one of the worst economic records in the country."

headline.main: Ad Watch: Obama Ad Focuses on Jobs in Romney Era
